content.content: Please digest and give feedback on the Oracle Team Mandate proposal.     Mandate: Oracle Teams Governance       Oracle Team Mandate Introduction The Maker Foundation is proposing a new role, the Oracle Team, which is responsible for the technical development and administration of the Oracles infrastructure. This role will follow the same ‘interim’ model shared by other foundation teams and is designed to, eventually, be entirely community-driven.  As this document represents a formalization of the role he already occupies on behalf of the community, the Foundation is proposing that Niklas Kunkel, Head of …
